name: The Last Paladin
description:
This game is bilingual. 

Supports language: Chinese and English.

Game name: The last paladin
Author: Alan Z. (遗忘的银灵)
Version: 1.0
Everyone except you was corrupted by the dark magic storm.
Defeat these corrupted and mutated being, and survive as long as you can!
WASD:   Move
Left click:  Light attack
Right click: Heavy attack
Space:   Dodge
Shift:   Sprint
Tab:   Lock enemy
Num1:   Holy heal (cost 30 MP)
Num2:   Summon holy blade (cost 50 MP)
ESC:   Pause

---中文----

游戏名称：Last paladin / 最后的圣骑士
作者：Alan Z./遗忘的银灵
游戏背景：除你之外的所有人都被魔潮侵蚀堕落了！
战胜并净化他们的灵魂，并试着得到更高的分数吧。
操作：
WASD: 移动
鼠标左键: 轻攻击
鼠标右键: 重攻击
空格: 翻滚
Shift: 冲刺
Tab: 锁定敌人
Num1: 圣愈 (30 MP)
Num2: 圣剑附魔 (50 MP)
Esc: 暂停
